node.doctext:
[% my $N = getNode('oblique strategies data', 'restricted_superdoc'); my @strategies = eval $$N{doctext}; #return $strategies[0]; my @grid; foreach (1..20) { $grid[int(rand(10))][int(rand(10))] = $strategies[int(rand(@strategies))]; } my $str; foreach my $y (1..10) { $str.="\n"; foreach my $x (1..10) { my $strategy = ""; $strategy = $grid[$y][$x] if defined $grid[$y][$x]; $str.=""; } $str.=""; } $str; %]
$strategy
node.title: oblique strategies garden
